ARABIC: ذُرِّيَّةًۢ بَعْضُهَا مِنۢ بَعْضٍ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Allah chose Adam and Nuh and the family of Ibrahim and the family of 'Imran over all other beings -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They were descendants of one another; and God hears all and knows everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (for His messengership) - a people alike and the seed of one another. Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They were the offspring of one another. God is All-hearing and All-seeing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They are the descendants one of another; and Allah is the All Hearing, the All Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Offspring, one of the other, and Allah is All-Hearer, All-Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Offspring one of the other; and Allah is Hearing, Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: seed of one another; God hears, and knows.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They were descendants one of another. Allah is Hearer, Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They are the offspring of one another. God hears all and knows all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Progeny, one of the other, and Allah is Hearing, Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: some of them are descendants of the others, and Allah is all-hearing, all-knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Offspring, one of the other: And Allah heareth and knoweth all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Offspring, one of the other, and Allah is the All-Hearer, All-Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They were the offspring of one another. Allah is Hearing, and Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Offspring one of the other. God is Hearer and Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Descendants, some of them from others. And Allah is Hearing and Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:34] the seed of one, offspring from, another, of them; God is Hearer, Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They were descendants one of another) some follow the religion of others and the offspring of some are the descendents of others. (Allah is Hearer) of what the Jews say: that they are Allah's children and beloved ones and that they follow His religion, (Knower) of their punishment and of whom is following His religion.
